description: This file is a CMake module script that attempts to locate the gstreamer-video-1.0 library and defines CMake variables and imported target for it if found. It includes commands to find the package via pkg-config, handle package configuration, and set up imported libraries for use in a CMake project.

methods.name: find_package
methods.description: Invokes CMake's module to locate the PkgConfig package

methods.name: pkg_check_modules
methods.description: Uses pkg-config to check for gstreamer-video-1.0 modules

methods.name: FIND_PACKAGE_HANDLE_STANDARD_ARGS
methods.description: Processes handle args for the package detection

methods.name: add_library
methods.description: Defines an imported CMake library target for GStreamerVideo::GStreamerVideo

methods.name: set_target_properties
methods.description: Sets properties on the imported library target, such as location and interface include directories
